prompt:
Description: Jake and Grace dance with Neytiri
Action: 

###
completion: Jake takes Grace’s hand and pulls her up, protesting. JAKE lets the DRUMS and CHANTING flow through him. He lets himself go, dancing from the inside, channeling the primal energy. GRACE is rocking out, grinning. We see the young girl, so repressed, who lives within her. Jake and Neytiri flow amongst the dancers, but they are looking only at each other. ENDSTR

prompt:
Description: Sam begs Ghostface not to kill Tim
Character: SAM (O.S.)
Dialog: 

###
completion: Please, please don’t kill him! ENDSTR

prompt:
Description: The ship with the people inside goes through the wormhole
Action: 

###
completion: The ship continues to slide through the wormhole. Through the outer hull they see images of themselves repeating -- a trick of the narrow collar of space they are sinking through. Cooper smiles at himself. The experience is unnerving. ENDSTR

prompt:
Description: Daugther hears her parents arguing
Action: 

###
completion: Little Kaylie lies awake in bed, listening to the argument unfold. ENDSTR

prompt:
Description: Rocky studies how Apollo fights
 Action: 

###
completion: Several hours later Rocky is engrossed in watching another Apollo Creed film... He sits motionless.  Something catches his eye.  Rocky stops the projector as Apollo is delivering a knockout blow to an unfortunate opponent. Rocky moves right up to freeze frame and inspects it like it was a priceless painting... He backs off and begins writing on a note pad. ENDSTR

prompt:
Description: Ebony Maw tells Thanos that there's a duplicate of Nebula in this universe
Character: EBONY MAW
Dialog: 

###
completion: Sir, the file appears...entangled. It was a memory, but not hers. (dawning on him) There’s another consciousness sharing her network. Another Nebula. ENDSTR

prompt:
Description: Strider doesn't look happy when he looks at Frodo
 Action: 

###
completion: STRIDER sighs. His face bears remorse as he turns to FRODO. ENDSTR

prompt:
Description: Kevin is not ready to have a relationship with Vicky
Character: KEVIN
Dialog: 

###
completion: I didn't say that. I mean, love, it's like a term that gets thrown around. People say things, they get married, have kids, and then what? It's like they call it off, going 'I was wrong.' ENDSTR
